Kitzka:
Will of Antharas is a command stone that Antharas has implanted into its subordinates in order to command their actions. It is a tool that maximizes the magic power of Antharas's subordinates. If you combine it with the Sealed Blood Crystal, you can obtain an itemwith incredible magic power that, when used, can resurrect numerous people simultaneously.
This Sealed Blood Crystal can be obtained by hunting the Drake Lord, Behemoth Leader, and Dragon Beast inside Antharas's Cave.
